alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton County through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garysburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seaboard around 735 PM EDT. Conway around 755 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mud Castle, Milwaukee, Pendleton, Jackson, Boones Crossroads, Pleasant Grove, Severn, Margarettsville, Creeksville and Gumberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
